title: Frame
description:
Say goodbye to the stress of payments and rest easy knowing you have a robust and reliable payments processor in your corner via hosted checkout or API.

White glove service is available upon request!

title: Lemon Squeezy (acqd by Stripe)
description: Lemon Squeezy offers a streamlined solution for digital goods; focusing on easy setup; strong customer support; and analytics

title: Gumroad
description: Gumroad is ideal for creators and small businesses; providing tools for selling comma subscriptions; and more.

title: Paddle
description: Paddle caters to SaaS and software companies; offering a comprehensive platform with billing; licensing; and global tax handling.

title: FastSpring
description: FastSpring specializes in e-commerce solutions for software and SaaS companies; with a focus on global payments and subscriptions.

title: 2Checkout
description: 2Checkout offers versatile payment solutions; excelling in global payments; subscription billing; and digital commerce.

title: Payoneer
description: Payoneer simplifies cross-border payments; offering local payment ease globally with a focus on market expansion and Multi-Currency.

title: Chargebee
description: Chargebee is a subscription management platform; perfect for SaaS and SMBs; with robust features for billing and revenue management.

title: Maxio (ex Chargify)
description: Maxio; formerly Chargify; offers a robust platform for B2B SaaS billing and financial operations; focusing on growth and efficiency.

title: Recurly
description: Recurly offers a dynamic subscription management platform; excelling in churn management and actionable data insights for subscription growth.

title: Braintree
description: Braintree provides a versatile global payments platform; integrating multiple payment methods with a focus on conversion and security.

title: PayKickstart
description: PayKickstart offers a modern commerce platform for subscription billing and Affiliates; focusing on revenue maximization and churn minimization

title: PayPro Global
description: PayPro Global offers a full-service eCommerce solution for selling software and SaaS; focusing on global payments; tax compliance; and customer support

title: Shopify Payments
description: Integrated with Shopify; this service is ideal for SMBs in e-commerce; offering a seamless shopping cart and payment experience.

title: Square
description: Square provides versatile POS and payment solutions for small businesses; with a strong focus on retail and mobile payments.

title: Zoho Billing
description: Zoho Subscriptions is an online recurring billing and subscription management comma ideal for small and medium-sized businesses. Emphasizing professional invoice creation; time and expense tracking.

title: WePay
description: WePay; a Chase company; provides integrated payment solutions focusing on software and SaaS companies; with customizable payment solutions.

title: QuickBooks Payments
description: This service provides seamless accounting and payment solutions for SMBs and SaaS businesses. Featuring real-time tracking and automated bookkeeping.

title: Mangopay
description: Mangopay offers a modular payment infrastructure for marketplaces and platforms; emphasizing flexibility; global payouts; and AI-powered Anti-fraud.

title: Coinbase Commerce
description: Start getting paid with Base; Ethereum; and Polygon. 1% transaction fee.

title: BTCpay
description: BTCPay Server is a self-hosted; open-source cryptocurrency payment processor. 0% Fees & No Third-party.

title: Lago
description: Open-source alternative to Stripe Billing and Chargebee. Billing & metering in one place.

title: Mollie
description: EU-focused solution to accept payments; optimise conversion; and access funding.

title: Adyen
description: Adyen offers a single platform for payments; risk management; and optimization; suitable for SMBs and SaaS companies.

title: Speed
description: Bitcoin/lightning payment processor for e-com. Starts with 0% fee.

title: OpenNode
description: Fast bitcoin payments and payouts for business. Comes with API and ecommerce integrations.

title: Coingate
description: Accept Bitcoin & 70+ Cryptocurrencies. Comes with API and ecommerce integrations.

title: Buy Me a Coffee
description: Stupid simple solution for donations or a members-only feed. One-off payments and recurring payments.

title: CheckoutPage
description: The easy-to-use checkout page builder with a variety of templates. Focus on sales funnels and forms.

title: ConvertKit Commerce
description: Easy monetization for creators; offering unique features like direct ebook sales; paid newsletter subscriptions; and integrated payment processing with low fees.

title: Kajabi
description: Comprehensive platform for creators to build; grow; and manage online courses; coaching; and memberships. 0% share fees but starts from $149/m

title: Kofi
description: A creator-friendly platform for accepting donations; selling memberships; commissions; and shop items with 0% fees on donations.

title: Koji
description: E-commerce platform designed for social media; offering customizable digital storefronts and templates with confusing transaction fees between 5-15%.

title: Memberful
description: Specialized membership software for creators; offering customizable tools like gated content; private podcasts; and newsletters with easy integration and management.

title: MemberSpace
description: A versatile membership platform enabling creators to sell memberships and digital products on any website; with features like tiered access; customizable billing; and seamless integration with multiple platforms.

title: Outseta
description: An all-in-one membership software offering integrated tools like CRM; email marketing; billing; authentication; and help desk; designed to streamline and monetize SaaS or membership businesses efficiently.

title: Patreon
description: A platform for creators to build communities; share exclusive content; and monetize their passion through direct fan engagement; offering various revenue streams like memberships and online shops.

title: PayHip
description: An easy-to-use platform for selling digital downloads, courses, coaching, and physical products, featuring customizable store builders, VAT handling, and integrations with tools like Zoom and Calendly.

title: Loofa
description: Loofa allows SaaS and digital goods merchants to optimize their payment stack by easily swtiching between Paddle and Stripe depending on if they need to charge sales tax/VAT. This way, merchants can stay compliant with global sales tax/VAT AND save on payment fees where possible.

title: PayIt
description: Payyit helps small businesses manage money easily. It lets you make invoices, get paid online, do accounting, and get expert advice all in one place.

title: PaymentsLabs
description: Payment Labs helps businesses pay people worldwide easily. It handles cross-border payments in many currencies, follows tax rules, and makes sure everything is legal and secure.
